name: The Life's Lane
summary:
Can You Achieve what every Immigrant or Refugee Dreams, by making it to The United States of America ?
Can You Achieve what Everyone Dreams, by making The Big Bucks ?
Experience an Epic Journey taking You from a poor African Country to The USA, where You'll have to Forge Your Own Path to financial success!!! Gain appropriate Work Experience, Improve your Qualifications and make smart Investment decisions. Enjoy the luxuries in life while carefully balancing your budget and time. Can You Achieve the American Dream by retiring rich and early ?
